Package net.sf.jIPtables.rules

Provide an interface for generation, parsing and application of iptables rules.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Chain An iptables chain that contains the corresponding rules
Command The classes that extend this class can access iptables rules arguments
IPTables Interact directly with the system iptables application.
Rule A rule for the firewall.
RuleSet Contains the configuration tables used by iptables
Table A table that contain chains
XMLRules Convert RuleSet to XML document and vice versa
 

Enum Summary
Chain.Policy The default policy of the chain, only built-in chains supports the default policy
RuleSet.TableType The supported tables
 

Exception Summary
ParsingException Exception throwed when an error occurs in rule parsing
 

Package net.sf.jIPtables.rules Description

Provide an interface for generation, parsing and application of iptables rules.
The IPTables class is the interface for communication with the system firewall.
The RuleSet class is used to represent the rules, it can be build also by parsing the iptables exported rules (with iptables-save command).
